params.amount: Amount of outcome tokens to buy
params.outcome: Index of the outcome to buy

params.alpha: Alpha parameter for the LMSR cost function (0 for default value)
params.expiresAt: Expires at timestamp for the market
params.initialCollateral: Initial shares per outcome (actual cost calculated via LMSR)
params.outcomeCount: Number of outcomes for the market
params.startsAt: Starts at timestamp for the market

params.newExpiresAt: New expiry timestamp (must be in the future and later than current expiry)

returns._0: The current alpha value

params.amount: The amount of outcome tokens to buy

returns._0: Price impact in basis points for the specified outcome

isConsumingScheduledOp().details: Returns true only in the context of a delayed restricted call, at the moment that the scheduled operation is being consumed. Prevents denial of service for delayed restricted calls in the case that the contract performs attacker controlled calls.

returns._0: True if the market is resolved, false otherwise

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

params.isApproved: Whether to approve or reject the market
params.marketId: The ID of the market to review

params.amount: Amount of outcome tokens to sell
params.outcome: Index of the outcome to sell

setAuthority(address).details: Transfers control to a new authority. The caller must be the current authority.

params.allowed: Boolean indicating if the token is allowed
params.minimumCollateralAmount: Minimum initial collateral amount for this token

params.isPublicResolver: Boolean indicating if the resolver is public

params.marketId: The ID of the market to update
params.metaDataURI: New metadata URI for the market

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

XO_MARKETS().notice: Returns the XO Markets NFT contract

X_OUTCOMES().notice: Returns the X Outcomes ERC1155 contract

buy(uint256,uint8,uint256,uint256).notice: Buys outcome tokens for a specified market

closeMarket(uint256).notice: Closes a resolved market, making it available for redemption

createMarket(uint40,uint40,address,uint2.notice: Creates a new market with specified parameters

extendMarketExpiry(uint256,uint40).notice: Extends the expiry time of a market

getAlpha(uint256).notice: Gets the current alpha parameter value for a specific market

getBuyPriceImpactBps(uint256,uint8,uint2.notice: Calculates the price impact in basis points when buying outcome tokens

getCollateralConfig(address).notice: Gets the configuration for a collateral token

getCollateralTokenAllowed(address).notice: Checks if a collateral token is allowed

getGlobalResolver().notice: Gets the current global resolver address

getMarketCollateral(uint256).notice: Retrieves the total collateral amount for a market

getMarketOutcomeTokenAmount(uint256,uint.notice: Retrieves the amount of outcome tokens for a market

getMarketOutcomeTokenIndex(uint256,uint8.notice: Retrieves the index of the outcome token for a market

getMarketResolver(address).notice: Gets the configuration for a market resolver

getMinimumInitialCollateral(address).notice: Retrieves the minimum initial collateral amount for a specific token

getOutcomePurchaseCost(uint256,uint8,uin.notice: Calculates the cost to purchase a specific amount of outcome tokens

getOutcomeSaleReturn(uint256,uint8,uint2.notice: Calculates the return from selling a specific amount of outcome tokens

getPotentialReturn(uint256,uint8,uint256.notice: Gets the potential return for a specific share amount when the market is resolved

getPrice(uint256,uint8).notice: Retrieves the price of a specific outcome in a market

getPrices(uint256).notice: Retrieves the prices of all outcomes in a market

getProtocolFee().notice: Retrieves the protocol fee in basis points

getRedeemableAmount(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves the redeemable amount for a specific amount of winning tokens

getRedeemableAmountPerShare(uint256).notice: Retrieves the redeemable amount per share for a market

getSellPriceImpactBps(uint256,uint8,uint.notice: Calculates the price impact in basis points when selling outcome tokens

getSharesForCollateral(uint256,uint8,uin.notice: Calculates the approximate number of outcome shares for a given collateral amount

isMarketResolved(uint256).notice: Checks if a market is resolved

pauseMarket(uint256).notice: Pauses an active market, preventing trading until unpaused

redeem(uint256).notice: Redeems collateral for a resolved market

resolveMarket(uint256,uint128).notice: Resolves a market by specifying the winning outcome

reviewMarket(uint256,bool,string).notice: Reviews a pending market for approval or rejection

sell(uint256,uint8,uint256,uint256).notice: Sells outcome tokens for a specified market

setCollateralTokenAllowed(address,bool,u.notice: Sets whether a collateral token is allowed

setGlobalResolver(address).notice: Sets the global resolver address that will be used for all new markets

setMarketResolverFee(uint16).notice: Sets the fee for a market resolver

setProtocolFee(uint16).notice: Sets the protocol fee in basis points

unpauseMarket(uint256).notice: Unpauses a paused market, allowing trading to resume

updateMarketMetadata(uint256,string).notice: Updates market metadata URI (only allowed while market is pending)
